definition: to sketch/to delineate
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
surname Gou
see 勾當|勾当[gou4 dang4]
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: Ss read again and find the detailed information, then finish the exercise: Tick or cross.
sentences.chinese: 阅读过程中指导学生详细阅读，对重点信息圈点勾划。

sentences.english: This part of the story is a wonderful illustration of God's goodness to a sinner.
sentences.chinese: 故事的这个片段，正好勾划了神如何恩待罪人。

sentences.english: The human life journey cannot be charted by a single curving line.
sentences.chinese: 人的生命历程不能用单一的曲线来勾划。

sentences.english: Says Mulish , The human life journey cannot be charted by a single curving line.
sentences.chinese: 人的生命历程不能用单一的曲线来勾划。

sentences.english: Delineation of channels is the first step of geologic evaluation .
sentences.chinese: 勾划河道的轮廓是地质解译的第一步。

sentences.english: Then the words begin to flow from the reader, this wonderful hymn of love.
sentences.chinese: 接著，我们就听见这段勾划爱的美妙诗篇。

definition: to sketch out/to delineate
to draw/to describe
annotations made in a book/fig. remarks and comments/to have an opinion on everything
to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
to draw the outline of/to outline/to sketch/to delineate contours of/to give a brief account of
to delineate/to articulate/to evoke/to draw out/to tick off
to describe
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]
to describe/to portray
strokes of a Chinese character
to portray
to put pen to paper/pen mark
lit. not even one stroke is negligent (idiom)/fig. to write characters (calligraphy) in which every stroke is placed perfectly
strokes of a Chinese character
